title: Christmas Chocolate Fruit Cake
ingredients: ['165g plain flour', '2 tablespoons cocoa powder', '1/2 teaspoon baking powder', '130g dried apricots, chopped', '235ml boiling water', '140g marzipan', '150g caster sugar', '4 eggs', '150ml milk', '85g dark chocolate, chopped', '60g crystallised stem ginger, finely chopped', '160g unsalted butter, melted']
